00048 #define DEBUG(s,d) fprintf(stderr,s,d)
00049 #else
00050 #define DEBUG(s,d)
00051 #endif

00053 // TODO: should be changed to throwing
00054 // an exception or something.
00055 // void ylerror(const char *s);
00056 #define ylerror(s) {                                            \
00057     std::cerr << "\033[1;31mException:\033[0m " << s;           \
00058     std::cerr << ", in " << __FUNCTION__ << " at " << __FILE__; \
00059     std::cerr << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;                  \
00060     abort();                                                    \
00061   }
00062 
00063 #define err_not_implemented() {                                         \
00064     ylerror("member function not implemented for this class"); }
00065 
00066 // not used right now
00067 #define ITER(x) x##__iter

00070 extern bool drand_ini;
00071 
00072 #define check_drand_ini() {                                           \
00073     if (!drand_ini) printf("You have not initialized random sequence. \
00074 Please call init_drand(time(NULL)) before using this function !\n"); }
